message.body: On my way to work, I was looking up Italian people who took the DNA test and their results. They were confused why they were a small percentage Italian (one was only 13%). Someone broke it down saying southern Italians are a hodgepodge. If the test says "Eastern European" it's most likely reporting Albanian ancestry. If it says "British Isles" it could be because the British traded with Sicily and you have British soldier ancestry.
Haha. Oh man. I am definitely video taping you when you read your results.
It says that the test might even report an "Unknown" percentage because Sicilian ethnicity confuses the algorithm.
So you're a hodgepodge.
And Albanian! I asked about that.
This is going to be a long wait!
They say everyone is. Aboriginals in Australia/Polynesia have the least amount of mixing. Icelandic people have less mixing too
Tell me about it!
I can't pay off my loans with a credit card
Crap. I should've bought ancestry DNA with it
How am I gonna spend $500
Hm. I was wondering if I would be able to use it for mine too. I should have bought my computer with it. I'm not gonna be able to spend 500 dollars either.
Maaan
I know. I was really annoyed when I put my computer on discover because I was too tired to think of my chase card.
I'm annoyed because I was going to pay for ancestry with it. But I had just paid off my student loan and thought for some reason I used my credit card. And I didn't wanna go over the 150 dollar max
Man. And I spent so much on Christmas! Ugh! I'm just realizing that
So your loans are done?
Haha. We're not good at using credit cards. But I guess that's good thing.
No not yet. Christmas set me back
I LOVE YOU!
I love you too
Hope you're hungry. We're having sausage and lentils. You had it before and you liked it.
Sounds Good
I'm going to see Zack now
Ok. Let me know when you're on your way back.
I'm at city hall
Ok. See you soon.
